attributes.review: Donald trumps app is terrible he is a awful person. And he will never make America great again. Along with that the app looks bad and is VERY glitchy. Overall I really hate Donald trump and his app
attributes.title: THIS APP IS AWFUL

attributes.review: America has been in some deep crap ever since Trump has been elected to be the president. “Make America Great Again” can go fly off a cliff along with his clownery. I am ashamed be to an American and do not claim Trump as our president. OBAMA 2020!!
attributes.title: Obama 2020 🇺🇸

attributes.review: This is a horrible app, it needs so much work I don’t even know where to start! Y’all need better brain up in there!
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review:
the app was so very glitchy it even showed me a ugly, crusty cheeto that’s i very much would  not eat.🤭😖i lost my appetite. And as if that wasn’t enough my eyes were stained by a shrimp ON THE CHEETO😳😵 It was horrible👩‍🦯👩‍🦯

attributes.title: 🗑🟠✨not pleased ✨🟠🗑

attributes.review: This app is HORRIBLE do NOT download it!! It made my phone so glitchy to the point where I could NOT use it! Trump is not worth it. I give it one stare cause it’s just so BAD!
attributes.title: 🧚🏻‍♀️✨almost as bad as the president✨🧚🏻‍♀️

attributes.review: THIS APP IS ABSOLUTELY HORRIBLE. #1, it NEVER STOPS GLITCHING. #2, i just wanted to find some reasons to vote for him in the next election but... on this app? absolutely not. i have perfectly good wifi and this app just...HORRIBLE.
attributes.title: horrible app, don’t download.

attributes.review: Make America great again? More like make America worst again. This app is glitchy and I have heard people gettting hacked please do not download this app if you gett frustration easy
attributes.title: Bad app

attributes.review: My name is sue. My grandmother loves this man, so I downloaded this app to show her. Then the authorities and the president came through my door and threw my grandma into the ceiling then broke her arm. I will NEVER download this app again Rest In Peace gran.
attributes.title: THIS APP IS HORRIBLE

attributes.review: I opened the app and the amount of patriotism gave me a seizure and I was sent to the hospital where I have suffered so much brain damage I have become but a mindless following sheep 😞
attributes.title: Almost died 🥵
